tool_description: An API to pull data of Indonesian postal code by Province, City / District, Sub District,  and village.
name: Indonesian Postal Code List and Search
title: Indonesian Postal Code List and Search
tool_name: Indonesian Postal Code List and Search

api_list.name: Postal Code by Province (slug)
api_list.description: Get list of area and postal code by Province.

optional_parameters.name: perPage
optional_parameters.description: Default max result per page, max 25

api_list.name: Search Data by Query
api_list.description:
You can query data from our database by some keyword such as:

- Province Name (Provinsi)
- City Name (Kota / Kabupaten)
- Sub District Name (Kecamatan)
- Urban Name (Kelurahan/Desa)
-  Postal Code (Kode Pos)

api_list.name: Get Postal Code Information
api_list.description: Get details from some postal code, sometime some postal code used by one or more urban / village

api_list.name: Postal Code by Urban (Kelurahan / Desa)
api_list.description: Get postal code from an urban / village (Kelurahan/Desa)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesian-postal-code-list-and-search.p.rapidapi.com/kodepos/kelurahan/air-bening-bermani-ulu-raya-rejang-lebong-bengkulu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesian-postal-code-list-and-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesian-postal-code-list-and-search.p.rapidapi.com/kodepos/kelurahan/{urban_slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesian-postal-code-list-and-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Postal Code by Sub District (Kecamatan)
api_list.description: Get postal code from selected Sub District (Kecamatan)

api_list.name: Postal Code by City (slug)
api_list.description: get postal code list from area on selected city

api_list.name: List Indonesian Province
api_list.description: This list will be used ond another endpoint to take postal code by province name

import requests

url = "https://indonesian-postal-code-list-and-search.p.rapidapi.com/provinsi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesian-postal-code-list-and-search.p.rapidapi.com"
